modal-settings.title: Settings
modal-settings.cfg_limit_max_tips: The maximum number of files that can be processed
modal-settings.cfg_limit_warn_tips: Warn when number of files exceeds this value
modal-settings.cfg_fsn_tips: When this option is enabled, if the current step name is the default value or the same as the current runner name, the step name will be automatically updated when switching the runner
modal-settings.cfg_font_sys_tips: Use the built-in font of the program, close it and use the system font. Note: Using the system font may cause unknown UI problems, and these problems will *not* be fixed.
modal-settings.cfg_font_bold_tips: Use a bolder font to enhance readability

modal-task-cfg.title: Task Configuration
modal-task-cfg.no_step_name: You must provide a name for this step
modal-task-cfg.runner_unknown_tip: You may have loaded an incorrect workflow configuration file or a non-existent external runner!
modal-task-cfg.runner_no_desc: No description provided for this runner
modal-task-cfg.runner_arg_no_desc: No description provided for this argument
modal-task-cfg.runner_no_arg: This runner does not need any arguments
modal-task-cfg.arg_hover_tips: Hover over the argument name to view the argument information

modal-flow-manage.title: Load Saved Workflow
modal-flow-manage.del_cfm_title: Are you sure you want to delete this workflow?
modal-flow-manage.no_select: Please select a workflow to load
modal-flow-manage.cfg_no_select: Please select a workflow from the list on the left

modal-flow-update.title: Save/Update Workflow
modal-flow-update.name_pattern: Workflow name can only contain Chinese, English, numbers and _
modal-flow-update.ow_cfm_msg: Workflow with the same name already exists, overwrite?

basecfg.msg_max_limit: Cannot load file list, too many files
basecfg.msg_source_conflict: Do not select duplicate folders, subfolders or parent folders as sources!
basecfg.msg_warn_limit: You selected too many files, please wait for loading
basecfg.msg_drop_impure: Selected path contains non-folder items, automatically filtered

details.source_view_title: View all files from the source
details.result_view_title: View the status list of the current flow result
details.filter_all_title: Show the status of all source files
details.filter_flowpass_title: Show the status of files that have passed the flow check
details.filter_complete_title: Show the status of files that have passed the flow check and have output results
details.flowpass_ok: This file has passed the workflow
details.flowpass_fail: This file has not passed the workflow
details.complete_fail: This file has not output results

taskflow.no_task: You have not added any steps yet

flow-ctrl.no_runner: Error: Some steps reference non-existent runners!
flow-ctrl.no_result: No result to apply, have you run the "Dry Run" and has complete result?
flow-ctrl.run_cfm_msg: Confirm that the current configuration and the preview result are correct and apply this result?
flow-ctrl.run_move_e17: The system cannot move the file to a different disk drive. (os error 17)

flow-manage.cfg_local: Loaded from local, double-click the status point to clear the workflow description information
